content: Settlement Banks ceased providing credit and slowed payments  Payment Banks slowed payments  Clearing Members ceased providing credit and slowed payments  Customer's Banks ceased providing credit and slowed payments  Payments Chains on October 20, 1987  CCP  Settlement Bank  Payment Bank  Clearing Member  Customer  Customer's Bank  Settlement Bank may provide  intraday credit to Clearing Member  Clearing Member may provide   credit to Customer  Customer's Bank may provide   credit to Customer
